features: ❉【SPORTS NECK FAN WEARABLE 】- This creative neck fan can be hung around your neck and for a more convenient job. The dual fan head neck fan has a 360° flexible rotation and design 3 speed adjustment a more powerful airflow to enhance air circulation.

❉【USB RECHARGEABLE DESIGN 】-The Neck fan Has a Built-in 2500 mAh Super Long Life Rechargeable Battery,The fan Blade is a Seven-Leaf Design,Which Can Be Quickly Charged Through USB,Neck fan Has Three Working Modes: Low/12 Hours, Mid/8 Hours, And High /6 Hours.Press The Power Button To Adjust, Simple Operation。

❉【UPGRADED VERSION PERSONAL PORTABLE USB FAN 】- The portable neck fan is made of environmentally friendly ABS fireproof material. Each fan head combines 7 bionic fan blades to make the blade softer, more durable and quieter. Transmit more wind for you.

❉【NECK FAN SMALL SIZE,STRONG PERFORMANCE】- Weighing only 6.5 ounces, you can put it in a handbag or hang it around your neck.suitable for various outdoor activities.Before using the wearable sports neck fan, long hair should be tied up to avoid being caught by the fan head.

❉【The right way to use the neck fan】: to prolong the battery life and prevent the battery from losing power during transportation and storage resulting in failure to turn on, we recommend that after you receive the neck fan Please charge for 30 minutes before starting .any problems during use, please contact us, we will help you to solve the problem so you can have a good shopping experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Summer is always sweltering!Whenever people need to hold a fan to cool down when they are outdoors, it is a very troublesome thing.This time our neck fan is definitely your best choice, free your hands, give you the freedom to do what you want to do, no worries! Hands-free headset design:You can hang it around your neck, the fashionable style makes you look really cool, while your friends are still holding the fan, you can easily work freely and enjoy the coolness brought to you by the hanging neck fan, what a cool thing to do! In addition, it is ergonomic silicone and lightweight design, so it won't hurt your neck when you wear it for long periods of time. Enjoy the cool breeze wherever you go!

Instuction: 1. Fans should be worn in from the back of your neck. 2. Long press 3 seconds to turn on/off the fan. 3. Each time you press to change the wind speed, a total of high, medium and low wind speed three grades. 4. Fan head can be freely bent to change the wind direction. 5. Blue light flashing when working and red light on when battery is low. 6. Red light long on when charging and blue light on when full charging. Precautions for use: Children should be used under the guidance of their guardians. Avoid small objects such as hair protruding into the fan to prevent the fan from running. Please stop using the product if it appears abnormal. Please unplug the charging cable in time after charging the product. Do not switch on when charging.

Low noise design The hands-free fan is equipped with a high-performance motor that works for you at a fairly low noise level. You don't have to worry about disturbing others when using it in a quiet environment such as home, library, office, etc. Three Speeds Low/Medium/High speed levels. Adjust to the most comfortable wind speed you like by pressing the power button. Suitable for a variety of scenarios, work, shopping, cooking, sports, and even running. Convenient to carry This hanging fan is small in size and light in weight. You can also bend the fan into a compact size and easily carry it in a backpack or suitcase for travel. 360° free rotation This neck fan has two 360° freely rotating fan heads, so you can adjust the angle to get the cool breeze where you want it!
Product parameter list Product size 300*190mm Weight 185g Power consumption 0.3W-1.2W Connection type Type-C Fan gear 3 Noise Extremely quiet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for working in heat
reviews.reviewText: I worked at Target during the summer, and the AC went out. I was miserable and couldn’t cool down fast enough, so I decided to get a fan I could wear around my neck without having to hold it. I was pleasantly surprised by the power of this little fan as well.I have had this for a few years now & it works wonderfully. I now use it when I mow the grass.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for my work
reviews.reviewText: I've gone through a lot of these little fans. They're awesome for my work don't think I could work without them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this fan because it keeps my face cool but I wish the fans had a bit more length so I can put them in better positions to keep me cool. I haven’t tested to see how long the battery lasts but I’ve used it for hours without needing to charge it. I think it looks a little weird but it works well and is worth it to look a little weird instead of a lot sweaty.Update: the left fan is barely working now :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While it looks a little more dorky orGimmicky .. this baby does everything it promises .. I purchased a competing product that looked more sleek (like headphones) but it was weak in outdoor environments … when you’re sitting still outside with these you’ll swear there is a wind blowing in your face if you have it positioned properly .. while I can’t speak to its longevity .. it’s a great buy day 1 and the price was right .. only enhancement could be an optional 2 more fan insert to really dork it out but you’ll literally be cool as a fan then

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well but dies quick
reviews.reviewText: It is a great product love how I can adjust the direction of the fans, but after a full charge, it only lasts about 3 hours not enough for a full work shift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not work correctly
reviews.reviewText: First I have to admit, I purchased this neck fan last summer, 2022. I bought this to use while at church dummer camp and forgot to write a review when I got home. The fan did not charge very well at all. I had to have the fan at a certain angle for a connection to be made for the charging cord and the charging port. Today I went to charge the fan as I’m getting ready to go to camp tomorrow. I plugged the charging cord in and the light blinked then went out. When I took out the plug to see if something was asked the entire port mechanism came out with the charger. I’m so disappointed because this coming week is going to be record high temperatures and I was hoping to be able to keep a little cool while walking from activity to activity. I also will put it on one of my campers if they are beginning to get overheated. I’ll have to go back to paper fans to blow some of the heat away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORTH IT GET IT !
reviews.reviewText: I love this fan I have two because I had to get a second one. And I’m in love it really cools the face and next down in seconds. It’s lightweight and has a really good battery life. Literally never leave home without it! Especially when I know it’s hot it gonna be hot had to be fullest charge and leave with me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My wife has hot flashes. This blows air right in her face and she loves it. They aren't expensive so I bought two so she can use one set while the other set is charging.

reviews.reviewTitle: Poor Quality dont buy at all.... Will work for 5 months only and then wasted
reviews.reviewText: Poor Quality dont buy at all.... Will work for 5 months only and then wasted
L'idea e' buona ma senceramente e' difficile da portare, pesante e direi anche un po' troppo rumoroso

reviews.reviewTitle: Please dont buy it. It's not even worth Rs. 10. Dint even work for a day
